movie.title: 3 Bears Christmas
movie.description_intro: Baby Bear sneaks out on Christmas morning to find the perfect gift for his parents Mama and Papa Bear only to cross paths with a wicked witch who transforms him into a human.
movie.description_full: Baby Bear sneaks out on Christmas morning to find the perfect gift for his parents Mama and Papa Bear only to cross paths with a wicked witch who transforms him into a human.

movies.title: Pony and Birdboy
movies.summary: Pony and Pigeonboy tells a story of seven-year-old girl Pony who doesn't want to go to school, and big-mouthed Pigeonboy who has solution to all possible problems.
movies.description_full: Pony and Pigeonboy tells a story of seven-year-old girl Pony who doesn't want to go to school, and big-mouthed Pigeonboy who has solution to all possible problems.
movies.synopsis: Pony and Pigeonboy tells a story of seven-year-old girl Pony who doesn't want to go to school, and big-mouthed Pigeonboy who has solution to all possible problems.

movies.title: D3: The Mighty Ducks
movies.summary: In the third episode of this series, the Ducks get scholarships to Eden Hall Academy, a high ranking prep school. But as freshmen, they will have to face the snob varsity team...
movies.description_full: In the third episode of this series, the Ducks get scholarships to Eden Hall Academy, a high ranking prep school. But as freshmen, they will have to face the snob varsity team...
movies.synopsis: In the third episode of this series, the Ducks get scholarships to Eden Hall Academy, a high ranking prep school. But as freshmen, they will have to face the snob varsity team...

movies.title: The Nutcracker
movies.summary: On Christmas Eve, a little girl named Marie (Cohen) falls asleep after a party at her home and dreams herself (or does she?) into a fantastic world where toys become larger than life. Her beloved Nutcracker (Culkin) comes to life and defends her from the Mouse King, then is turned into a Prince after Marie saves his life.
movies.description_full: On Christmas Eve, a little girl named Marie (Cohen) falls asleep after a party at her home and dreams herself (or does she?) into a fantastic world where toys become larger than life. Her beloved Nutcracker (Culkin) comes to life and defends her from the Mouse King, then is turned into a Prince after Marie saves his life.

Her beloved Nutcracker (Culkin) comes to life and defends her from the Mouse King, then is turned into a Prince after Marie saves his life.

movies.title: Snow White and the Three Stooges
movies.title_english: Snow White and the Three Stooges
movies.title_long: Snow White and the Three Stooges (1961)
movies.summary: Based on the classic fairy tale, Larry, Moe, and Curly Joe (the Three Stooges) substitute for the Seven Dwarfs while the princess Snow White (Olympic figure skating champion Carol Heiss) is forced to flee from her jealous stepmother, the queen (Patricia Medina), who takes drastic steps to insure that Snow White never gains the throne.
